title: Bug 16822: Search results not removed when file is moved
OB: When X.java is moved to 'P/src2', the search result is still present in the search view. Attempting to double-click on the search result opens a 'Search Error' dialog. The error message states: 'An error occurred while creating a Java element. Reason: X.java does not exist.'
EB: The search result for X.java should be automatically removed from the search view when the file is moved.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Move X.java to 'P/src2'.2. Open the search view.3. Observe that the search result for X.java is still displayed.4. Double-click on the search result and observe the 'Search Error' dialog with the error message.
